Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Establishes the New York city musical and theatrical production tax credit
Summary: Establishes the New York city musical and theatrical production tax credit; establishes credit shall be 25% of qualified production expenses, not to exceed five million dollars per qualified New York city musical and theatrical production.
LawCode: Add §24-c, amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L; add §99-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the New York city musical and theatrical production tax credit; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
